instructions.title: How To Delete Your Blizzard Account
instructions.before: To Delete Your Blizzard Account you have to contact customer service.   You cannot disable the account on your own. You can contact them by **emailing privacy@blizzard.com** or by following the steps below to send a ticket.
instructions.after: You will receive a confirmation message through your email.

qnAnswers.question: What happens when I delete my Blizzard Account?
qnAnswers.answer: Your information will be deleted and you will no longer have access to any associated Blizzard entertainment accounts.  A deleted account cannot be recovered. This option should only be used for users wishing to permanently discontinue use of their account and all associated games.

steps: [Click Here to Contact Customer Service] (https://eu.battle.net/support/en/help/product/battlenet/804/807/ticket).  Type in your Personal Information.
Type a Deletion Request and Click Send
